comments: Professor Jason Vanora is the sweetest. He cares about every student and their feelings. He give three tests, and has a lot of extra credit. He will give extra credit until the next exam which lets it add up to like 20 points and then adds it to that test. BEST PROFESSOR EVER!!! Take him and youll enjoy your time.
